Description: Ivory hair-pin; lozenge-profiled body, possibly turned, tapering to a point; bulbous head; polished surface, now worn with some pockmarks.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Chavane M.-J. 1990, La nécropole d'Amathone. Tombs 110-385. Les petits objets. Études Chypriotes XII (Nicosia).
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p. 117, tomb 30)
